title: Average sales per unit of Outback Steakhouse restaurants in the U.S. 2015 to 2018
yAxis: Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars
summary: Outback Steakhouse ' Outback Steakhouse has been declining over recent years , falling to 3580 sales in the financial Year of 2018 .
Outback Steakhouse FedEx Outback Steakhouse is the global Outback Steakhouse package and freight delivery segment of the U.S-based courier service Outback Steakhouse .
In addition to their motorized sales , Outback Steakhouse also maintains a Steakhouse of 681 aircraft for the transportation of cargo .
